```{r setup}
library(spatialexplain)
library(terra)
```

```{r}
predictors = rast("/vsicurl/https://github.com/Nowosad/IIIRqueR_workshop_materials/raw/refs/heads/main/data/predictors.tif")
plot(predictors, axes = FALSE)
```

```{r}
data("regr_exp", package = "spatialexplain")
regr_exp
```

```{r}
regr_psp_bd = predict_spatial_parts(regr_exp, predictors, maxcell = 100)
plot(regr_psp_bd)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
regr_psp_bdi = predict_spatial_parts(regr_exp, predictors, maxcell = 100,
                                    type = "break_down_interactions")
plot(regr_psp_bdi)
```
